summary: Added weapons to Aetherium Forge.  The Aetherial Dagger, Sword and Greatsword;  Stronger, faster and lethal.  Newly added Katana Set.
descriptionHtml:
Aetherial Weapons - Katana Set

-Contributors: sboombi

-Requires: Dawnguard DLC

-Tested: Crafted Aetherial Katana, Dai-Katana and Tanto at Aetherium Forge.  Upgraded Aetherium Katana set, with and without Daedric perk.

-Description

Added Katanas to be crafted at Aetherium Forge.

Aetherial weapons require Daedric perk for upgrade bonus.  Perk not necessary to craft.

-Installation

Extract the 7z file and just drop the contents in the Data directory of Skyrim.

Using Skyrim Launcher, activate the plug-in \"AtherialWeaponsKatanaSet.esp\"

-Uninstall

Delete AtherialWeaponsKatanaSet.esp and AtherialWeaponsKatanaSet.bsa




Aetherial Weapons.
-Requires: Dawnguard DLC

-Tested: Crafted Aetherial weapons in Aetherium Forge.  Crafted iron dagger, sword and greatsword at various forges.  Upgraded Aetherium weapon, with and without Daedric perk.  Upgraded iron weapons.

-Description
Added weapons to be crafted at Aetherium Forge.  Standard(vanilla) blade weapons, that when crafted, have been replaced by a variation of Aetherial Weapons.

Aetherial weapons are approximately 25% stronger then Daedric weapons.  Aetherial Bow fires 100% faster.  Aetherial weapons require Daedric perk for upgrade bonus.  The perk not required to craft.

Vanilla weapons have been replaced at the crafting forge.  Only way to obtain Aetherial weapon skin is to craft the weapon.

Aetherial Bow was added as a replacement to Zephir.  Has been removed.  Included to craft at Atherium Forge ;)

-Installation
Extract the 7z file and just drop the contents in the Data directory of Skyrim.
Using Skyrim Launcher, activate the plug-in \"AtherialWeapons.esp\"
-Uninstall
Delete AtherialWeapons.esp and AtherialWeapons.bsa
author: sboombi
